desc: The way we make clothes is rather old-fashioned. We use only natural fibers and create color with leaves, flowers, minerals, roots, funghi and other elements of the earth. From our organic thread to our compostable corozo nut buttons, we've become known for our attention to detail and the resultant quality.

layout.text: Our clothes are traceable from organic farm to closet. This is good for our bodies, our communities and the earth!
